review_title: Program Manager's View of MAP International
pros: I worked for MAP for over 4 years and it is a wonderful place to work. MAP is an organization that is making a difference around the world.  MAP has great leadership, wonderfully experienced staff and a ministry that is making a difference in the lives of the 'poorest of poor' for over 50+ years.
cons: None in my opinion. It is a good company and the only reason I left was because of my career spouse's promotion.

pros: Great International NGO; would refer to a friend and others
cons: Needs to expand reach around the world; More donors and the public need to know more about this NGO. Greater publicity is needed.

pros: Friendly people who love their jobs, relaxed work environment, doing good
cons: Very quite work area, the cubicals and room are very bland

pros: opportunity to make a difference in the lives of the world's poorest people
cons: divisive workplace; people don't trust others with a different faith experience
there has been no downsides so far
